title: KuCoin’s Market Share Drops By 50% As Legal Woes Mount
description: Cryptocurrency exchange KuCoin has seen its market share decline by 50% following legal action by the Department of Justice and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.

title: GSR Markets secures license in Singapore to offer OTC services
description: GSR’s Singapore divison secured a rare regulatory nod from Singapore as the city-state aims to become a crypto-friendly hub. GSR Markets, a Hong Kong-headquartered crypto market maker, has secured a license for its Singaporean division from the Monetary Authority of…

title: Polkadot (DOT) Price Correction: What’s Next After a 12% Dip?
description: Polkadot’s future does not look good as it breaks a key support level to trade below $9 and loses 12% of its value in two days.  Analysts have observed that the price of DOT is no longer directly correlated with its Development Activity, linking its previous price growth to external factors.  Polkadot’s (DOT) recent recovery [...]

title: Altcoin Charts Show Bullish Signs Ahead of Bitcoin Halving and Altcoin Season
description:
